rank: #1 in Best Colleges for Art in America
description:
editorial
Yale is an elite private university located in New Haven, Connecticut. It is a mid-size institution with an enrollment of 6,594 undergraduate students. Admissions is extremely competitive as the Yale acceptance rate is only 5%. Popular majors include Economics, Political Science and Government, and Information Science. Graduating 98% of students, Yale alumni go on to earn a starting salary of $56,600.
